Articles.Content:
Hello Everybody!

As you may know, I have been running the Kavent Kallender challenge thread for over a month. With that now gradually coming to a close along with December, I thought to myself:

This has been one of the most successful things I've done in a long while. And it's a lot like the old Reddit challenges. Maybe... Just maybe... I could work on my own version of the Reddit challenge with my old challenge as inspiration?

And so this thread was made. This new thread will be a more up-to-date version of the old Reddit challenges. But because it's a dead thread from June in 2015, here are the ideas of the challenge:

- There will be three modes: Easy, medium and Hard (with the monthly 'Manley Mode')

- I hope that this will be kept up by a group, including myself and some friends (some of whom don't even play KSP!)

- I'll upload a video onto my youtube channel every once in a while with one of the challenges.

This challenge thread is still in its infancy. I could really do with your help to improve the thread before 2015. How can you do that? Simple: reply giving suggestions and ideas on challenge ideas, rules and other neat stuff!

Edited December 21, 2014 by TJPrime
Is this basically like the old weekly challenges? Cause if so that's going to be brilliant!

As you may know, I have been running the Kavent Kallender challenge thread for over a month.

What? that's a challenge thread? I didn't know, I thought it was a thread of tutorial objectives.

Is this basically like the old weekly challenges? Cause if so that's going to be brilliant!

Yup. But I like to think of it as 'the old weekly challenge thread that wasn't weekly'. This will be weekly, unless something happens in the world of TJPrime. If that's the case and it is expected, it will be noted. If it's unexpected, then I'm either very ill, dead or have been banned from the computer by parents.

What? that's a challenge thread? I didn't know, I thought it was a thread of tutorial objectives.

It's on the challenge forum, and it's not really a tutorial objective thread in my opinion. But if you think of it as a tutorial, then I've really outdone myself there!

Edited December 21, 2014 by TJPrime

-snip-

But if you think of it as a tutorial, then I've really outdone myself there!

You have. Except for the occasional exception (like the Day 19th explosion) it is pretty much a list of tutorial objectives. For example this was the first time I tried to create a satelite network.

You have. Except for the occasional exception (like the Day 19th explosion) it is pretty much a list of tutorial objectives. For example this was the first time I tried to create a satellite network.

Who knew? lol
